alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Ida; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 5:48AM CDT until April 23 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cherokee County in northwestern Iowa... Eastern Woodbury County in west central Iowa... Ida County in west central Iowa... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 548 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Danbury, or 17 miles southwest of Ida Grove, moving north at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Battle Creek and Anthon around 600 AM CDT. Ida Grove, Correctionville and Cushing around 605 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Holstein, Washta and Galva. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
